tool.name: fast5 to pod5
tool.description: converter for raw Oxford Nanopore data
tool.command:
mkdir input_fast5
&&
tar -xf '$fast5_in' -C input_fast5
&&
pod5 convert fast5 --threads \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} --recursive --output output.pod5 input_fast5

param.name: fast5_in
param.label: Oxford Nanopore raw data in fast5 format in a tar archive

data.name: pod5_out
data.label: Oxford Nanopore raw data in in pod5 format

tool.help: Convert fast5 to `pod5 <https://github.com/nanoporetech/pod5-file-format>`__ for basecalling with Dorado.
